mouseover_blocker.comment: blocks mouse detection for bottom 2 px rows to prevent mouseon/off anim glitch

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: [[col:red]]This Ataman cannot be moved. The province capital is currently under siege.[[/col]]

component_text.text: One Ataman can be assigned for every two provinces that you own.
Assign an Ataman to govern a province, conferring bonus effects.

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: You do not have any provinces available to assign an Ataman to.

dy_turns.componentleveltooltip: Turns until the Ataman will come into effect.

contested.name: contested
contested.tooltip: [[col:red]]Contested province. If the Ataman is moved, a new Ataman will not be able to be assigned until the province is fully under your control.[[/col]]
